Context: The Ontario College Council of Chief Information Officers (OCCCIO) is a council established to help IT leaders of member institutions in Ontario colleges achieve their strategic and operational goals. The OCCCIO hosts an annual spring conference, with the 2022 edition being hosted by George Brown College in Toronto, Ontario from June 6-8, 2022. Companies interested in sponsoring the event can contact occciosponsorship@georgebrown.ca. As of January 27th, 2022, Platinum-level sponsorships and the CDIO Dinner Opportunity have been sold out. For more information, sign up on their website or contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The phone numbers provided are 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559. Their social media hub can be visited through the given links. The information on this website is subject to change without notice.
